QueryCounterpartyInfoResponse.title: Query Counterparty Info Response
QueryCounterpartyInfoResponse.description: QueryCounterpartyInfoResponse is the response type for the Query/CounterpartyInfo RPC method.

merkle_prefix.description: merkle prefix key is the prefix that ics provable keys are stored under

client_id.description: client identifier is the identifier used to send packet messages to our client

ibc.core.client.v2.CounterpartyInfo.title: Counterparty Info
ibc.core.client.v2.CounterpartyInfo.description: CounterpartyInfo defines the key that the counterparty will use to message our client
